about.title: About
about.content: Developer with experience in React Native, ReactJS, and NextJS, solid skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript. Communicative and committed, I meet deadlines efficiently. Familiar with agile methodologies such as Scrum and versioning tools like Git, GitHub, and GitLab. Experience in mobile and web projects, both as a team collaborator and as a freelancer. Constantly seeking evolution and professional improvement.

job1.title: SPECIALIST FRONT END DEVELOPER
job1.description: Creation of web applications and mobile apps using technologies: ReactJS, NextJS, React Native, Typescript, Javascript, Scrum, Figma, using Git, Gitlab, and Github as versioning tools. Responsible for maintenance, version management, publication of Android and iOS Apps, and user support.

job2.title: FRONT END DEVELOPER
job2.description: As a freelancer, I work as a Front-End developer using technologies: HTML, CSS, SASS, SCSS, JavaScript, Typescript, ReactJS, React Native focusing on creating: Apps, Landing Pages, Web Sites, Mobile and Web Design.

job3.title: FRONT-END DEVELOPER - INTERNSHIP
job3.company: Regional Electoral Court of Piauí, Teresina, Piauí
job3.description: Development of Web Applications, Maintenance and Implementations of Internal Projects using technologies: HTML, SCSS, Angular 15+, ReactJS, React Native, TypeScript, Javascript and Git | Gitlab as versioning tools.

degree2.title: Bachelor's Degree, Computer Science
degree2.institution: Federal Institute of Piauí - South Zone
